<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Register the EH frames with the runtime so that c++ exceptions work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\p Addr parameter provides the local address of the EH frame section</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This method is called when object loading is complete and section page</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// permissions can be applied.  It is up to the memory manager implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to decide whether or not to act on this method.  The memory manager will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// typically allocate all sections as read-write and then apply specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// permissions when this method is called.  Code sections cannot be executed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// until this function has been called.  In addition, any cache coherency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// operations needed to reliably use the memory are also performed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// By default, only sections that are &quot;required for execution&quot; are passed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the RTDyldMemoryManager, and other sections are discarded. Passing &#39;true&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to this method will cause RuntimeDyld to pass all sections to its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// memory manager regardless of whether they are &quot;required to execute&quot; in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// usual sense. This is useful for inspecting metadata sections that may not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// contain relocations, E.g. Debug info, stackmaps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Must be called before the first object file is loaded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld/#a19cd93eb917e2a8cc5c900a5c0c015a4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld/#a19cd93eb917e2a8cc5c900a5c0c015a4">setProcessAllSections</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ProcessAllSections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;ProcessAllSections = ProcessAllSections;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Perform all actions needed to make the code owned by this RuntimeDyld</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instance executable:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1) Apply relocations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2) Register EH frames.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3) Update memory permissions&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#42; Finalization is potentially recursive&#42;&#42;, and the 3rd step will only be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   applied by the outermost call to finalize. This allows different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   RuntimeDyld instances to share a memory manager without the innermost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   finalization locking the memory and causing relocation fixup errors in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   outer instances.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#42;&#42; Recursive finalization occurs when one RuntimeDyld instances needs the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   address of a symbol owned by some other instance in order to apply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   relocations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld/#a71b4a375f2964ea13d4064b81dba59ef">finalizeWithMemoryManagerLocking</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Warning: This API is experimental and probably should not be used by anyone</span></CodeLine>
